profile.name: Name
profile.tierDescription: Fees discount based on your company payment plan

roles.rolesDescription: Send invite to add new admins and traders. At least one member needs to be an admin.

change-role-backdrop.mainViewSubtitle: You will upgrade user to an admin role.
change-role-backdrop.content3: 3. Invite and assign roles to new users.
change-role-backdrop.infoBox: If a user is actively using the platform, they will receive a prompt to refresh their view as part of the upgrade process.
change-role-backdrop.verifyViewSubtitle: Enter the code shown in your authenticator app.
change-role-backdrop.successViewSubtitle: User now has access to all administrative features.

send-invite-backdrop.mainViewSubtitle: For security purposes, invite needs to be sent to sign up. Please use institutional email to send your invite.
send-invite-backdrop.successViewSubtitle: Soon, you will be receiving an email with an invite link to sign up to Neutral app.
send-invite-backdrop.errorViewSubtitle: Please try again. If this issue persist, contact support.

api-keys.apiKeysDescription: API keys are useful tools for automated trading, position and risk monitoring.

new-api-key.labelPlaceholder: Enter a label for this key
new-api-key.label: Label
new-api-key.disclaimer: The secret key will be displayed only once, so make sure to store it in a secure location.
new-api-key.successSubtitle: Key is ready to be used to manage company account.
new-api-key.createApiKeyDisclaimer: Save your secret key before you continue.
new-api-key.authDisclaimer: For your safety, do not share this information to anyone.
new-api-key.verifyApiKeyCreatedDisclaimer: Be sure to secure your secret key. You will be able to remove this API key any time you want.

delete-api-key.warningSubtitle: Once removed, you will not have access to the capabilities of this key.
delete-api-key.warningSubtitle2: Deleting an API key can cause:
delete-api-key.content1: 1. API keys are used to facilitate programmatic access to an exchange's functionalities. By deleting an API key can disrupt applications, bots, and services relying on it, impacting their access and functionality.
delete-api-key.content2: 2. Without an API key, you will need to rely on manual access to your account, accessing the platform through the user interface and providing authentication credentials.
delete-api-key.verifySubtitle: By deleting this API key, you will not be able to access to the capabilities of this key.
delete-api-key.successSubtitle: You will not have access to the capabilities of this key.

disable-authenticator.warningSubtitle: Once disabled, codes delivered by this device will not work to verify.
disable-authenticator.warningSubtitle2: Not having an authenticator app can cause:
disable-authenticator.content1: 1. An authenticator app provides an additional layer of security by requiring a unique and time-sensitive code for authentication, making it significantly harder for attackers to gain access.
disable-authenticator.content2: 2. Phishing attempts involve tricking people into providing their login credentials on fake websites or through malicious emails. With an authenticator app, the attacker would still need the time-sensitive code from the authenticator app to complete the authentication process.
disable-authenticator.content3: 3. Malicious software, such as keyloggers or screen capture tools, can capture a user's passwords as they enter them. Without an authenticator app, these captured passwords would be sufficient for an attacker to gain unauthorized access to an account.
disable-authenticator.content4: 4. Even if the device is lost or stolen, an attacker would still need the physical device or access to the app itself to generate the correct codes for authentication.
disable-authenticator.verifySubtitle: Enter the authenticator code shown in your app.
disable-authenticator.successSubtitle: Codes delivered by this device will not work to verify. Please add a new device to keep your account safe.
